content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Mining and Smelting Complex at (-18.0, -53.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-18.0, -53.0)
- Collection chest at (-17.5, -51.5)
- Burner inserter at (-16.5, -51.5) moving items from chest to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-15.0, -51.0)
- Burner inserter at (-13.5, -50.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-12.5, -50.5) containing 143 iron plates

### Copper Mining and Smelting Complex at (-28.0, -61.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28.0, -61.0)
- Collection chest at (-27.5, -59.5)
- Burner inserter at (-26.5, -59.5) moving ore to furnace
- Stone furnace at (-25.0, -59.0)
- Burner inserter at (-23.5, -58.5) moving plates to storage
- Storage chest at (-22.5, -58.5) containing 8 copper plates and 28 iron plates

### Coal Mining Setup at (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (41.0, -82.0)
- Collection chest at (41.5, -80.5) containing 10 coal
- Burner inserter at (41.5, -79.5)

### Power Generation Complex at (-4.5, 12.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine at (-4.5, 12.5)
- Boiler at (-4.5, 16.0)
- Offshore pump at (-3.5, 27.5)
- Connected by pipe networks carrying water and steam

### Science Pack Production at (8.5, 13.5)
Consists of:
- Input chest at (5.5, 13.5) containing 2 copper plates
- Burner inserter at (6.5, 13.5) moving items to assembling machine
- Assembling machine 1 at (8.5, 13.5)
- Burner inserter at (10.5, 13.5) moving output to storage
- Output storage chest at (11.5, 13.5)
- Connected by transport belt groups for material movement

ERROR TIPS

### Errors when trying to extract non-existent items
- Verify item existence in chest before attempting extraction
- Check if production line is actually producing the required items
- Ensure proper item flow through the production chain

### Production line stalling issues
- Monitor fuel levels in burner devices
- Ensure proper resource input supply
- Check if all inserters have fuel and are properly positioned

### Assembly machine resource shortages
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before starting production
- Verify proper inserter placement and functionality
- Monitor input chest inventory levels

### Power system issues
- Keep boilers fueled with coal
- Monitor water supply from offshore pump
- Ensure steam flow to engines is unobstructed

### Missing automation science pack production
- Verify iron gear wheel availability
- Check if copper plate supply is consistent
- Ensure assembling machine has all required ingredients
